name: Fun Snake Game - Cool Smash
description:
The challenging and interesting one-tap game that makes you addicting. Fun Snake Game is the entertainment that pushes the cubes of your speed and reaction.
The game is simple with fun and cool gameplay giving you the exciting experience coming along with crosses and teleports. Defend the bottom line area from hungry cubed snakes.

How to play:
Simply tap your finger on the squares of snakes before they reach the bottom line of the screen earning the highest score possible. Lots of fun and action.

Try it now, play and have fun!!!
